00099 typedef struct thread_s {
00101    stackval_t *sp;
00103    stackval_t *stack;
00105    uint16_t stackSize;
00107    void (*func)(void);
00109    uint8_t state;
00111    uint8_t suspend_state;
00113    uint8_t priority;
00115    uint32_t st;
00117    uint8_t port;
00119   struct thread_s *next;
00120 } thread_t;
